name: tak-manager-root

scripts.package:mac: VERSION=$npm_package_version npm run image:mac --workspace=client && VERSION=$npm_package_version npm run package --workspace=tak-manager-wrapper/web && create-dmg --dmg-title="TAK Manager $npm_package_version" 'tak-manager-wrapper/dist/TAK Manager.app' tak-manager-wrapper/dist/
scripts.package:win: set VERSION=%npm_package_version% && npm run image:win --workspace=client && npm run package --workspace=tak-manager-wrapper/web && iscc tak-manager-wrapper/inno-tak.iss
scripts.setup:mac: npm install && cd tak-manager-wrapper && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements-mac.txt
scripts.setup:win: npm install && cd tak-manager-wrapper && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements-win.txt

author: Jacob Olsen
description: TAK Manager - A comprehensive TAK Server management solution
